# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-office-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="de8cf-102">适用于 Office 365 订阅者的高级 Outlook.com 安全性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Office 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="de8cf-103">所有 Outlook.com 用户都会受益于垃圾邮件和恶意软件筛选。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="de8cf-104">对于 Office 365 主页和 Office 365 个人订阅者, Outlook.com 对收到的邮件中的附件和链接执行额外的筛选。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="de8cf-105">若要了解详细信息, 请阅读[高级 Outlook.com security For Office 365 订阅者](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Office 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="de8cf-106">若要打开或关闭安全链接, 请转到 "[高级安全设置](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security)" (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="de8cf-107">**设置** > \*\*\*\* 高级 > **安全**)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="de8cf-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
